page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT IN UTTOXETER
page.content: YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME This is a nationwide scheme run by the Manpower Services Commission. It is a one year programme of education, training and work experience open to all 16 year old school leavers and unemployed young people. Trainees are paid a weekly allowance of 26.25 pounds. In Uttoxeter the 1984\85 data reveals the number of Y.T.S Trainees totals 164-94M, 72F. SHOPWORK 20 CARING 9 GARAGES 9 HAIRDRESSING 9 ADAMS BISCUITS 22 SHELL OIL 1 HORSES 1 AGRICULTURE 13 TYRE FITTING 1 HORTICULTURE 2 BUILDING 8 CATERING 1 LAUNDRY 6 ELECTRONICS 2 FURNITURE RESTORATION 4 The other 56 trainees here have been placed on nearby Y.T.S scheme.
